name: Univerbal (formerly Quazel)
long_description:
Univerbal is a conversational language learning tool that helps people learn a language simply by talking. In unscripted and dynamic conversation users can say whatever they like into the microphone and the AI responds and carries on the conversation. 
Just like with a real tutor, you get corrections and explanations for any potential mistakes you might make.

Try it: chat.quazel.com
one_liner: Language learning with a conversational AI Tutor
